description:
Palmolive Skin Food Desert Lime hyper nourishing hand wash soap is infused with native superfood extract and 100% natural AHA to renew skin.

Cleanse, moisturise and renew.

Is your skin hungry for more? Go beyond washing to deeply moisturise and nourish your hands, leaving them feeling soft and smooth.

Palmolive Skin Food is a hyper nourishing hand wash soap. Awaken your senses with bursts of zesty lime and hints of gardenia and sage.

Made for skin
- Removes germs
- Vegan formula
- 95% Natural Origin
- Native extract
- Dematologically tested
- Natural AHA

Free from Nasties
- No Parabens
- No Phthalates
- No Silicones
- No Mineral Oil
- Gluten Free
- No Artificial colours

Directions:
1. Lather on hands for 30 seconds
2. Rinse off

Palmolive Skin Food is suitable for dry skin. Proudly Made in Australia and the bottle is made with 30% recycled plastic.

Size: 500mL
Scent: Desert Lime

PALMOLIVE SKIN FOOD HAND WASH SOAP: Palmolive Skin Food is a hyper nourishing hand wash soap made for skin.

INFUSED WITH NATIVE SUPERFOOD EXTRACTS: Awaken your senses with bursts of zesty lime and hints of gardenia and sage with the Desert Lime hand wash soap

NATURAL AHA: Formula is made with 100% Natural AHA to renew skin

FREE FROM NASTIES: Does not contain Parabens, Phthalates, Silicones, Mineral Oil, Gluten and Aritifical colours

AUSTRALIAN MADE: Proudly made in Australia and the bottle is made with 30% recycled plastic
name: Palmolive Skin Food Desert Lime Hyper Nourishing Hand Wash 500ml
